mapper.select: select user_id, user_pwd, addr, phone, gender, grade, email, birth, job, name from user_info where user_id = #{id}

select count(*) from user_info where 1=1
and user_id = #{user_id} and name like '%' || #{name} || '%' and addr like '%' || #{addr} || '%' and email like '%' || #{email} || '%'

select user_id, user_pwd, name, addr, phone, gender, grade, email, to_char(birth,'YYYY-MM-DD'), job from user_info where 1=1
and user_id = #{user_id} and name like '%' || #{name} || '%' and addr like '%' || #{addr} || '%' and email like '%' || #{email} || '%'
select count(*) from sales_tbl s, sales_detail_tbl d where s.sale_id = d.sale_id and d.delivery_state = #{state} order by s.user_id, s.sale_id
select count(*) from sales_tbl s, sales_detail_tbl d where s.sale_id = d.sale_id

select user_id,sale_id,sale_time,sale_detail_id,item_id,quantity,delivery_state from (select rownum rank, a.* from(select s.user_id, s.sale_id, s.sale_time, d.sale_detail_id, d.item_id, d.quantity, d.delivery_state from sales_tbl s, sales_detail_tbl d where s.sale_id = d.sale_id order by s.user_id, s.sale_id) a) where rank > #{start} and rank < #{end}
select s.user_id, s.sale_id, s.sale_time,d.sale_detail_id, d.item_id, d.quantity, d.delivery_state from sales_tbl s, sales_detail_tbl d where s.sale_id = d.sale_id and s.user_id = #{id}
